title.narrative: Credit and Financial Services: Livestock Marketing and Resilience Programme

description.narrative: The overall goal of the programme is increased food security, incomes and climate resilience for poor households in pastoralist communities. The development objective is increased earning opportunities and improved living conditions in livestock-based communities.

name.narrative: Credit and Financial Services: Livestock Marketing and Resilience Programme

description.narrative: This point represents the centroid of the project area. For more detailed geographic information, please refer to the project page on the IFAD website.
